skins.selfIntroduction: Other than the coastal defence battle in the Mediterranean Sea and that one naval battle up north, I pretty much carried out all my missions normally... Well, there was that one time I needed serious repairs... b-but anyway! Since I'm here, I'll continue to put my best foot forward. Commander, I expect the same from you!
skins.acquisition: So you're the Commander? Hmph! Let's make one thing clear: I'm not easygoing like my sister, London. I'll expect you to have your act together!
skins.login: Are you ready to begin working? Don't come running to me if you find out later that you're missing something.
skins.details: Shropshire can be quite a handful to deal with... But, I suppose since she's the type of person who won't ever let herself draw the short straw, you should just let her be.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Excessive kindness can become poison. One must be strict when the situation calls for it.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you have time to gawk at me, you should get your work done first. After you finish, then you can, um...
skins.secretaryIdle3: ... If you're tired, get some rest. I'm not saying this for your sake - it's simply better if you're ready to give it your all when the situation calls for it.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, your collar is messed up. And your hair too... Hold still, I'll fix it for you.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, sit right there! Good grief... I'll have to re-teach you some basic manners...!

skins.shipDescription: What are you spacing out for? Have you not gotten tired of staring at all the swimsuits yet? Good grief... Are you able to help set up the parasol or the beach chairs at least?
skins.acquisition: What are you spacing out for? Have you not gotten tired of staring at all the swimsuits yet? Good grief... Are you able to help set up the parasol or the beach chairs at least?
skins.login: Commander, how's your work coming along? If I find out that you've snuck out here... Hehe~
skins.details: London's complaining about how she doesn't want to wear her swimsuit again because it's "too revealing" ...*sigh*. She could probably benefit from learning to think more positively about herself, like Shropshire does.
skins.secretaryIdle1: People aren't changing into swimsuits just for your viewing pleasure... Got it?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You should watch yourself around Shropshire. That girl develops a variety of... how should I say this? ...Bad habits during the summer?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hm? It's nothing. When we're at the beach, you can do whatever you want. *sigh*... It's just that... looking at your mug makes me really uneasy for some reason...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are you also interested in surfing? Hehe, I'll teach you the basics.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You just won't learn your lesson...!

skins.shipDescription: What are you staring at me for? I'm just the same as any of the others... Y-you have a few more hands to shake? Of course...
skins.acquisition: What are you staring at me for? I'm just the same as any of the others... Y-you have a few more hands to shake? Of course...
skins.login: How is your work coming along? Keep faffing about like that and you'll be putting in overtime!
skins.details: Miss Renown, do please let the Maids handle banquet security... the Commander is already here Honestly, how are we supposed to start the party without you?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: That Ajax, she's going to do that to the Commander again... I have to do something about her... Ah, it's nothing!
skins.secretaryIdle2: How long are you going to stare at me like that? Don't you have anything better to do?
skins.secretaryIdle3: My sister London is here... Phew, looks like I don't need to worry. I mean, it's London, there was never anything to worry about in the first place.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, look how crooked this is. You really must pay more attention to your formalwear... Right, there we are.
